ðŸ“– Summary: This repository offers a vast collection of over 1000 Bash scripts designed to streamline DevOps workflows. It covers a wide range of technologies, including cloud platforms (AWS, GCP), containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), CI/CD pipelines, database management, and big data tools. The scripts aim to automate common tasks, improve efficiency, and simplify infrastructure management for DevOps engineers.
